### Transform data to DBEM like

```{r}

# Set path for data
data_path <- my_path("G","Climate/cimip6/COBALT2/obsclim")

climate_data <- list.files(data_path,full.names = T)

```

## Get DBEM grid on data


```{r}

grid_dbem <- function(shapefile, dbem_grid, out = "df"){

  dbem_grid <- sf::st_as_sf(dbem_grid,
                            coords = c("lon","lat"),
                            crs = 4326)

  # if supplied a grid will rasterize
  if(inherits(shapefile, "sf")== FALSE){

    shapefile <- sf::st_as_sf(shapefile,
                              coords = c("lon","lat"),
                              crs = 4326) 
  }else{

    # Make sure shapefile is in the same coordinate system
    shapefile <- shapefile %>%
      st_set_crs(4326)
  }

  # Merge both
  if(out == "sf"){
    merge_grid <- sf::st_join(dbem_grid,
                              shapefile,
                              join = st_intersects)
  }else{
    merge_grid <- sf::st_join(dbem_grid,
                              shapefile,
                              join = st_intersects) %>%
      as.data.frame() %>%
      select(-geometry)
  }
  return(merge_grid)
}



```

```{r}
to_dbem <- function(data,yr,var,forcing){
  
  x <- data %>% 
    filter(year == yr) %>%
    ungroup() %>% 
    select(variable)
  
  
  name <- paste0("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-UBC/Data/Climate/cimip6/COBALT2/to_dbem/",forcing,"/",var$dbem_name,yr,".txt")
  write.table(x, file=name, sep="\t", col.names = F, row.names = F)
 gc() 
}
```

## Routine


```{r}


# for(i in 1:13){
for(i in c(7,10,12)){
  # i = 5
  print(climate_data[i])
  
  suppressWarnings(
    data <- ReadNetCDF(climate_data[i]) %>% 
      rename_with(~ "variable", 5) %>% # change to 5 for i = 5,7,10,12 due to data inconsistency
      left_join(shapefile,
                by = c("lon","lat")) %>% 
      mutate(date = ymd_hms("1901-01-01 00:00:00") + months(time),
             year = year(date)) %>% 
      group_by(rowid,year,lon,lat) %>% 
      summarise_at(c("variable"),
                   mean,
                   na.rm = T) %>% 
      mutate(variable = ifelse(is.na(variable), -9999, variable))
  )
  
  
  var <- variable_list %>% 
    filter(str_detect(climate_data[i],isimip_name))
  
  mclapply(seq(1961,2010,1), to_dbem, data = data, var = var, forcing = "obsclim")
  
}



```

```{r}


forcing <- "obsclim"

file_path <- list.files(paste0("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-UBC/Data/Climate/cimip6/COBALT2/",forcing,pattern = "uo",full.names = T))

nc <- nc_open(file_path)

# Extract relevant information
lon <- ncvar_get(nc, "lon")
lat <- ncvar_get(nc, "lat")
time <- ncvar_get(nc, "time")
uo <- ncvar_get(nc, "uo", start = c(1, 1, 1, 1), count = c(-1, -1, 1, -1))  # Extract only the first Z layer

# Close the NetCDF file
nc_close(nc)

# Get the time in years
years <- as.integer(time / 12) + 1901

# Create a data frame
df <- expand.grid(
  lon = lon,
  lat = lat,
  years = years
) %>% 
  left_join(shapefile,
              by = c("lon","lat")) %>% 
  left_join(dbem_coords)

# Add the Sea Water X Velocity data
df$Velocity <- as.vector(uo)

# Print the resulting data frame
print(df)


# Visualize data
df %>%
  filter(years == 2000) %>%
  group_by(lon,lat) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(Velocity, na.rm = T)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_tile(
    aes(
      x = lon,
      y = lat,
      fill = mean
    )
  )


# Save data for DBEM (Remeber to convert NAs to -9999)

ou_data <- df %>%
  group_by(year = years,index) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(Velocity, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  mutate(variable = ifelse(is.na(mean), -9999, mean))


to_dbem <- function(data,yr,var,forcing){

    select(variable)
  
  
  name <- paste0("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-UBC/Data/Climate/cimip6/COBALT2/to_dbem/",forcing,"/",var,yr,".txt")

mclapply(seq(1961,2010,1), to_dbem, data = ou_data, var = "AdvectionU_", forcing = forcing)
```

## Transform totalphy


totalphy2= (intppdiaz+intppsmall+intppico)*0.1 + diatoms

```{r}

# Get data paths
diat <- list.files("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-UBC/Data/Climate/cimip6/COBALT2/to_dbem/ctrlclim", pattern = "diat", full.names = T)
diaz <- list.files("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-UBC/Data/Climate/cimip6/COBALT2/to_dbem/ctrlclim", pattern = "diaz", full.names = T)
pico <- list.files("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-UBC/Data/Climate/cimip6/COBALT2/to_dbem/ctrlclim", pattern = "pico", full.names = T)

for(y in 1:length(diat)){
  
  # Read data
  npp_df <- bind_cols(
  read.table(diat[y]),
  read.table(diaz[y]),
  read.table(pico[y])
  )
    colnames(npp_df) <- c("diat","diaz","pico")
    
  
  totalphy_df <- npp_df %>% 
    mutate(totalphy = (diaz+pico)*0.1+diaz) %>% 
    mutate(totalphy = ifelse(is.na(totalphy),-9999,totalphy)) %>% 
    select(totalphy)
  
  name <- paste0("~/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-UBC/Data/Climate/cimip6/COBALT2/to_dbem/ctrlclim/","totalphy2",str_sub(diat[y],99,102),".txt")
  write.table(totalphy_df, file=name, sep="\t", col.names = F, row.names = F)
  
}
```
